roleset.name: to share the feelings or ideas

example.text: a distinguished supply-sider with monetarist sympathies

example.name: autogen2
example.text: Chairman Gonzalez expresses sympathy for Sen. Riegle , his counterpart as chairman of the Senate Banking Committee .
